title: Samsung Tooling Management System Management at Samsung
subTitle: Supporting the management of tooling scheduling system
overviewContent: Supported the management of the STMS (Samsung Tooling Management System) used for scheduling and coordinating mould usage in Samsung factories. Assisted in maintaining system efficiency and ensuring optimal utilisation of tooling resources.

jd: Assisted in installing, configuring, diagnosing, upgrading, and troubleshooting the STMS.
Performed maintenance tasks to ensure the availability and reliability of the tooling management system.
Provided support and responded to system enquiries from end-users.
Contributed to code refactoring and minor system improvements.
